scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../part3/phonebook
scripts.deploy: cd ../.. && git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook https://git.heroku.com/fullstackopen-tice-phonebook.git master
scripts.deploy:full: echo 'building...' && npm run build:ui && echo 'pushing to git...' && git add . && git commit -m 'uibuild' && git push -u origin master && echo 'deploying' && npm run deploy
